qa_pairs.question: What were the key changes in ASG Technologies' ownership and structure from its founding to 2015, and how did this affect its operations?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>ASG Technologies was founded in 1986 as Allen Systems Group by Arthur L. Allen.<cite>[S3]</cite></statement> <statement>In 2015, Allen Systems Group restructured into ASG Technologies Group under a consortium of new owners, including KKR & Co. L.P. and Evergreen Coast Capital, with Charles Sansbury appointed as CEO.<cite>[S4][S5][S6]</cite></statement> <statement>The passage does not explicitly describe how these ownership and structural changes affected the company's operations.<cite></cite></statement>
qa_pairs.chunk:
Passage 1:
[S1] ASG Technologies


# ASG Technologies



**ASG Technologies Group, Inc.**, doing business as **ASG Technologies**, is a provider of enterprise information management and IT System Management Solutions Software. [S2] ## History, acquisitions and funding

ASG Technologies was founded in 1986 by Arthur L. [S3] Allen as **Allen Systems Group**. [S4] In 2015, Allen Systems Group turned into ASG Technologies Group under a consortium of new owners led by KKR & Co. [S5] L.P. [S6] and Evergreen Coast Capital, with Charles Sansbury as CEO.ᶜⁱᵗᵃᵗⁱᵒⁿ ⁿᵉᵉᵈᵉᵈ

In 2016, the company had an estimated 3,000 customers across 60 countries and 41 offices worldwide. [S7] On March 7, 2018, ASG acquired Mowbly, an innovative business process mobility platform company. [S8] On April 12, 2021, Rocket announced it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire ASG Technologies,

qa_pairs.question: What was the significance of ASG Technologies' acquisition of Mowbly in 2018, and how does it relate to its business strategy?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>ASG Technologies' acquisition of Mowbly in 2018 marked a strategic move to enhance its enterprise information management and IT System Management Solutions Software by integrating Mowbly's business process mobility platform capabilities.<cite>[S8][S1]</cite></statement> <statement>This acquisition aligns with ASG Technologies' broader business strategy of expanding its portfolio through targeted acquisitions, as highlighted by its transition to ASG Technologies Group under new ownership and its focus on IT solutions.<cite>[S2][S1]</cite></statement>

qa_pairs.question: What major acquisitions and rebranding efforts has ASG Technologies undertaken, and how do they reflect its evolution since 1986?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>ASG Technologies was founded in 1986 as **Allen Systems Group** by Arthur L. Allen, marking its initial establishment.<cite>[S3]</cite></statement> <statement>In 2015, Allen Systems Group rebranded as **ASG Technologies Group** under new ownership by KKR & Co. L.P. and Evergreen Coast Capital, reflecting strategic restructuring.<cite>[S4][S5]</cite></statement> <statement>In 2018, ASG Technologies acquired **Mowbly**, a business process mobility platform company, to expand its enterprise IT solutions capabilities.<cite>[S8]</cite></statement> <statement>These acquisitions and rebranding efforts, starting from its 1986 founding as Allen Systems Group, highlight ASG Technologies' evolution into a diversified IT management solutions provider through strategic growth and market adaptation.<cite>[S3][S4][S5][S8]</cite></statement>
